products.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day and Night Blind in Green. Made to measure from £31.24 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Day and Night Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the Capri Vision Paradise Green Day and Night Roller Blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.
 
 Product ID: DB-VRBX1851 Fabric Colour: Paradise Green Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Aluminium tube with steel brackets     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes
